channel.title: Stargate Fans?
channel.description:
Hey, just wandering if any of you are awaiting the new series of Stargate Universe, considering a lot of you are like me, id say there a large population of gamers that are into it, and have been for sometime.
if you havent seen theres a new trailer on youtube and various sites, [url='https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mUlYsnMoAwk']https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mUlYsnMoAwk[/url]
and for you older fans going back to, ah i remember the first of the sg-1 days, whats your view on it?
Cheers guys :slight_smile: :retard: :smiley:

item.title: Stargate Fans?
item.dc:creator: popsUlfr
item.description:
Hence your name

Read full topic

item.title: Stargate Fans?
item.dc:creator: Caprica6
item.description:
SG-1 was great and just got better and better until the end IMO

Atlantis had its moments, but the Michael thing just got boring and I dunno why, but tough guy Ronan just got on my feckin wick :hmph:

Jury is still out on Universe, but from the trailers running on Sky atm, it looks rather meh, will give it a watch tho. I agree with Gom _Jabbar, having Robert Carlyle on the cast could be a stroke of genius

Main show I’m looking forward to atm, is the new BSG Spinoff ‘Caprica’ next year, the pilot was pure win

Read full topic

item.title: Stargate Fans?
item.dc:creator: Medevilae
item.description:
I was really into SG-1, not so much Atlantis. Universe looks like it could be decent, but as said, much drama. But hey, that’s what the kids are into these days.

Read full topic

item.title: Stargate Fans?
item.dc:creator: Gom_Jabbar
item.description:
Actually for me its had the optisite effect, I wanna watch it more now that they’ve got a proper seriouse Brit (ok speciffically scots) actor involved. Robert carlyle is imensely good.

Read full topic

item.title: Stargate Fans?
item.dc:creator: Mont_Blanc
item.description:
Strange, it don’t fell like a stargate related story (aside the stargate), looks like deadspace.

Read full topic

item.title: Stargate Fans?
item.dc:creator: Collision
item.description:
I liked the very first movie.

Anything after that, no, not really.

Read full topic

item.title: Stargate Fans?
item.dc:creator: popsUlfr
item.description:
Mango Assassin:

I think Season 5 of Atlantis was the best mate, watch it, but towards the end its a bit of a shut off, looks nicer though cause the filming is of a lot higher quality then the rest of the Atlantis series. :retard:

I will when it comes out here! The rest of the world always has to wait… meh I’m too cheap for those overpriced television channels.

JeffMOD:

I dunno about Universe, It doesn’t look like it retains the classic stargate formula, it looks more like a drama show than a sci-fi. I guess I’ll have to wait and see how the first episode plays out and then decide whether it’s true stargate or not.

If you think about it the 1st season of Atlantis had sort of survival horror vibe to it too. Only this time they really use it to fuel the show, it’s worth a shot.

Read full topic

item.title: Stargate Fans?
item.dc:creator: Nosehole
item.description:
Stargate SG1 stopped being good after the 8th season - nothing good came after that

The riginal movie was superior anyways…

Read full topic

item.title: Stargate Fans?
item.dc:creator: Mango_Assassin
item.description:
JeffMOD:

You called me?

I dunno about Universe, It doesn’t look like it retains the classic Stargate formula, it looks more like a drama show than a sci-fi. I guess I’ll have to wait and see how the first episode plays out and then decide whether it’s true Stargate or not.

Yeah, i mean a like all series, but SG-1 with RDA was soo much better in my opinion i loved the character he portrayed.

Also am i right in saying the american tv channel broadcasting this genres “Sci-Fi” is changing its name to “Sy-Fy” or so ive heard.

Read full topic

item.title: Stargate Fans?
item.dc:creator: Mango_Assassin
item.description:
popsUlfr:

It’s one of my favorite series. I’ve followed it since the Movie.
I’ve yet to see Atlantis Season 5 though…

Universe looks… grittier. I hope there will still be some sort of character tandem like Teal’c-Jack, Daniel-Jack, McKay-Sheppard, Ronon-Sheppard.

I think universe will deliver, i know what you mean though Ive come to love the series.

I think Season 5 of Atlantis was the best mate, watch it, but towards the end its a bit of a shut off, looks nicer though cause the filming is of a lot higher quality then the rest of the Atlantis series. :retard:

Read full topic

item.title: Stargate Fans?
item.dc:creator: TheeGoatPig
item.description:
I think I liked the more lighthearted fun-feeling nature of Stargate Atlantis. I’m not sure if I will care about Universe.

Read full topic
